# Hi there, I'm Sagi 👋
## ℹ️ About Me
I'm a junior penetration tester and security researcher, who loves breaking things (legally of course), finding security vulnerabilities  
and understanding how systems, computers, communication protocols and applications work. 🔐
<!-- - 🌱 Currently conducting vulnerability research on some vendors products -->
- 🎓 Graduate of the Penetration Testing Program in ITSafe Cyber College. 
- 👨‍💻 Ethical Hacking platforms I engage in: Hack the box, Portswigger web labs, Over the Wire, BWAPP etc.
- ✨ Passionate about learning about new attack techniques, and reading cybersecurity blog posts.
